spec_data.Name: php-pear-XML-Serializer
spec_data.Description:
XML_Serializer serializes complex data structures like arrays or object as
XML documents. This class helps you generating any XML document you require
without the need for DOM.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:39:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Swiss-army knife for reading and writing XML files
